sections.heading: education and training; purpose
sections.text: The purpose of sections 81-885.49 to 81-885.54 is to establish requirements for continuing education and training of real estate brokers and salespersons who are licensed in order to maintain and improve the quality of real estate services provided to the public.Sourc

81-885.49.Continuing education and training; purpose.

The purpose of sections 81-885.49 to 81-885.54 is to establish requirements for continuing education and training of real estate brokers and salespersons who are licensed in order to maintain and improve the quality of real estate services provided to the public.

SourceLaws 1985, LB 101, ยง 5;Laws 2011, LB24, ยง 1.
